actions.description: The fomorian makes three Rod attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.
actions.name: Rod

actions.description:
The fomorian casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At will: mage armor (self only), mage hand, prestidigitation

1/day each: chain lightning, cone of cold (6th-level version), fireball (6th-level version), fly, plane shift (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting
